page.title: 13TRADE IN PAXFORD AREA
page.content: Retail trade in Paxford area includes the sale of goods at the local shop and Post Office, of wines,spirits, beer,cigarettes and food by publicans fruit & flowers from the numerous fruit farms plus jams, jellies, chutneys, honey & home made cider. Service trades include daily milk and dairy produce deliveries to homes in the area and deliveries of bread, meat and fresh fish. Coal is supplied by two local coal merchants. There are several taxi services, three service garages and a heavy transport company, a wheelwright, fencemaker and an undertaker. There is also trade in the provision of bed and breakfast to tourists visiting the Cotswolds.
